name: orbita
title: Órbita - Manual do Usuário
description: Follow the posts in the Órbita, the Brazilian hacker news maintained by the Manual do Usuário
author: tcelestino

commands.name: orbita
commands.title: Órbita - Manual do Usuário
commands.subtitle: Follow the posts in the Órbita by Manual do Usuário
commands.description: All posts from the Órbita, the Brazilian hacker news maintained by the Manual do Usuário

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
